heading: Caged Heart of the Moonrage â€“ Diablo 4 Druid Malignant Heart
content: Caged Heart of the Moonrage is a Druid Malignant Heart granting Offensive buffs. Caged Hearts are socketed into their corresponding colored sockets on your jewelry. Once inserted, hearts can be replaced, but NOT removed. These Malignant Hearts were introduced to Diablo 4 in Season 1 - Season of the Malignant. Caged Hearts can change the way skills and builds work in significant ways. You can only summon additional Wolf Companion and gain +3 Ranks to . The effect does not stack. summoned this way can be converted with and also gain the , just like any other
